response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Given its exceptional capabilities, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a chance to secure a premium asset at a competitive advantage. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
